rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a foyer that includes storage and seating area. Vastu compliant, facing east to welcome positive energy.

An open-plan living space that integrates the kitchen. This design fosters social interaction and natural light flow. The room is oriented towards the southeast to promote balance as per Vastu principles.
A separate dining area adjoining the open-plan living/kitchen, with large windows that allow ample light and an inviting atmosphere. Vastu aligned with proper cardinal directions for prosperity.
A well-ventilated ground floor bathroom placed on the north side to avoid water flow towards main living areas as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Large entrance door facing east with a welcoming pathway, ensuring positive energy entry according to Vastu principles.
A back door leading to the swimming pool area and garden. This opening is placed towards the south-east as per Vastu norms for enhancing prosperity.
Multiple windows on the south and east sides to maximize natural light in the living room and kitchen, promoting a cheerful ambiance.
Strategically placed windows to provide ventilation and natural illumination to the dining area.

rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom designed with Bohemian decor, offering ample natural light from east-facing windows. The layout encourages relaxation and positive energy.

An additional bedroom in a bohemian style that complements the farmhouse aesthetic, featuring warm colors and unique textures. Vastu principles are adhered to by positioning the room towards the north for stability.

openings.description: Large east-facing window in the master bedroom to allow maximum natural light, aligning with both design aesthetics and Vastu recommendations.
Well-placed windows ensuring adequate ventilation and light, in line with the bohemian farmhouse style and Vastu norms.
